FuncDef:
The load-balance ecmp command enables you to enter the ecmp view from the system view.
The undo load-balance ecmp command deletes the ecmp load balancing configuration and restores the default load balancing mode. The load-balance ecmp command enables you to enter the ecmp view from the system view. The undo load-balance ecmp command deletes the ecmp load balancing configuration and restores the default load balancing mode. By default, it disables you to enter the ecmp view.
